description: Lists the labels in a dataset. Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels uses labels to describe images. For more information, see Labeling images. Lists the labels in a dataset. Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels uses labels to describe images. For more information, see Labeling images in the Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels Developer Guide.

parameters.name: DatasetArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset that you want to use.

nested_items.name: DatasetLabelDescriptions
nested_items.description: A list of the labels in the dataset.

nested_items.name: EntryCount
nested_items.description: The total number of images that use the label.

nested_items.name: BoundingBoxCount
nested_items.description: The total number of images that have the label assigned to a bounding box.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous response was incomplete (because there is more results to retrieve), Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels returns a pagination token in the response. You can use this pagination token to retrieve the next set of results.
